post_message: It was just two years ago today that iconic singer Natalie Cole performed "This Will Be (An Everlasting Love)" during the 125th Rose Parade. Following news of her death, this clip from the KTLA archive seemed like an appropriate tribute to the nine-time Grammy winner. Cole died Thursday evening at L.A.'s Cedars-Sinai Medical Center due to complications from ongoing health issues, according to a family statement provided to the AP. Read KTLA's story here: @webpagelink
